item.content:encoded:
Funeral St Francis of Assisi Sympathy Prayer Card

Hot Review! Funeral St Francis of Assisi Sympathy Prayer Card – Sympathy Cards Funeral St Francis of Assisi Sympathy Prayer Card products with good quality, you can be confident Funeral St Francis of Assisi Sympathy Prayer Card quality products and have the highest number of reviews in the same category Sacred Remembrance: St. Francis of Assisi Funeral Prayer Card

In reverence to the memory of your cherished departed, we present our exquisite St. Francis of Assisi Funeral Prayer Card. Embrace the profound solace of faith with this traditional Catholic keepsake, honoring those who have journeyed beyond this earthly realm.

Embrace Divine Comfort: Amidst the tender embrace of grief, find solace in the enduring light of faith. Our prayer card invokes the gentle spirit of St. Francis of Assisi, patron saint of animals, nature, and the environment, offering a comforting presence in times of sorrow.

Inspiring Novena Prayer: Discover on the reverse side a heartfelt novena prayer, invoking the compassionate intercession of St. Francis. This sacred invocation uplifts the soul, weaving a tapestry of divine grace and peace for the departed and those who mourn their absence.

Personalized Tribute: Each card provides a sacred space for personalization, allowing you to honor your beloved with the inscription "In Loving Memory of [Your Loved One’s Name]". A heartfelt gesture ensuring their legacy is forever enshrined in our hearts.

St. Francis: Beacon of Compassion and Love: St. Francis of Assisi, a beacon of compassion and love, embraced all of creation with boundless tenderness. His life exemplifies the profound connection between humanity and the natural world, inspiring us to nurture kindness and empathy in all we do.

Gift of Grace: Extend the gift of grace and solidarity to grieving hearts with our St. Francis of Assisi Funeral Prayer Card. A tangible expression of love and support, this sacred keepsake serves as a guiding light, illuminating the path towards healing and remembrance.

Illuminate Their Journey: As you gather to bid farewell to your cherished departed, let the gentle spirit of St. Francis illuminate their journey into the embrace of the Divine. May this prayer card serve as a symbol of everlasting love and remembrance, guiding their soul towards eternal peace.

Embrace the enduring legacy of faith and compassion with our St. Francis of Assisi Funeral Prayer Card – a testament to the eternal bond we share with those who have touched our lives with grace and love. Price:$33.45
